revised_title: Discovery and Properties of Triethylphosphine and its Reactions with Sulphur Compounds
tldr: This article presents a comprehensive study of triethylphosphine and its reactions with sulfur compounds. The author, A.W. Hofmann, provides a detailed analysis of the chemical properties and behavior of triethylphosphine, which is a phosphorus base. The research contributes to the understanding of phosphorus bases and their applications in organic chemistry.
